info.+content: "Oretacha Kaibutsu 3-nin-gumi yo" by Takuzou Kamiyama, Kaneta Kimotsuki, Taro Sagami

title.+content: kaibutsu kun tsui oshi uri kun
boku no petto nya kiba gaaru
kūhi bu mokuba to mahō nojūtan
kaibutsu kun miira otoko no shōtai wobarasu
shabon tama no nakano sutekina sekai
kaibutsu shiro he suzumi ni iko u
tori no mikata da! kondoru majin
dai suta dayo! dai kaibutsu nonbirasu ha!
miira otoko ha hone tsugi meijin
kaibutsu rukku mo guntai chō de
doa no mukō no kaibutsu kun
